backend/main.mo: Main backend actor handling user profiles, study materials, and previous year papers with roleâ€‘based access control.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that seeds initial study materials and merges them with existing store during upgrade.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting seeded study material feature and associated frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files for reference during build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color variables, themes, and global styling rules including dark mode.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app root element and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router and React Query providers with routes for landing and admin pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGuard: Protects admin routes by checking authentication and user role, showing appropriate loading or access-denied states.
frontend/src/components/CurrentAffairsSe: UI section showing current affairs with language selector and timeframe tabs.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/PreviousYearPape: Displays static UPSC prelims and mains paper listings with disabled download buttons.
frontend/src/components/ShareThisApp.tsx: UI component that displays the current URL and lets users copy it with feedback toasts.
frontend/src/components/StudyMaterialSec: Renders study materials and previous papers with filters, tabs, and textbook fallback cards using backend data.
frontend/src/data/currentAffairsSample.t: Provides static sample current affairs data structured by timeframe and language.
frontend/src/data/studyMaterialSample.ts: Exports type definitions for exam categories and languages; data now supplied by backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, stored identities, and session state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, study materials, and previous year papers through an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and sets CSS variables for light and dark mode color themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminContentManagerPa: Implements an admin-only interface to view, add, and delete study materials and previous year papers.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Defines the public landing page with hero content, navigation, and sections for study resources and papers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project schema version, feature requirements, architectural notes, and known issues for building the multilingual upscQueen web app. Contains user scope expansions for study materials, current affairs, and branding details.
